name: Open Space Radio Podcast
what_you_do: Open Space Radio is the official podcast of the National Recreation and Parks Association (NRPA), focusing on topics related to parks, recreation, and community engagement.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves professionals in the parks and recreation industry, including park managers, community leaders, and advocates for outdoor spaces.
signature_programs: National Gold Medal Award, NRPA Awards, Innovation Awards, Scholarships and Fellowships
current_projects: 2026 NRPA Awards nomination period is January 9 - March 27.
bio: Partnership with the American Academy for Park and Recreation Administration, recognized for excellence in parks and recreation.
